properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 9:54AM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 7 to 11 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM, Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY
